text: hello my name is josh herrin and i'm the
president founder of business technology
partners business technology partners is
a technology consulting and technology
IT support company located in New York
City and Detroit Michigan in 2007 our
company went through a significant
setback when in addition to the downturn
of the economy there is also a small
mutiny of several team members that were
key to our small business practice that
left and started a competing company
this is a pretty devastating move for us
considering the timing and the fact that
the US economy was hurting and we were
hurting to gain new customers the
business up until that point had been
doing very well for a period of about
ten years all of a sudden we went
through a major downturn and I found
myself having to focus very heavily
internally inside the company to hire
new people bring on staff trained that
staff and get people familiar with our
customers again and keep the existing
customer base happy one of the things I
did that was instrumental in turning our
company back around and putting us on a
good path was bringing in an outside coo
a consultant to help me run the business
a person came in did a fantastic job
reorganizing our back of house making
sure that our employees and our
technicians we're all being trained
properly and that we were putting the
procedures in place that we had always
had before and training the new staff
that replaced the people who left
one of the things that I realized that
was key to the decision process was that
from the period of 1997 2007 I had
brought in over ninety percent of our
clientele personally and that a lot of
our clientele was brought to the firm
based on referrals word of mouth my
personal reputation reputation of the
firm so having that coo really enabled
me to get back out there and make more
business contacts one of the things that
I did in addition was I joined three
very important networking groups and I
leveraged my contacts from those
networking groups to make more and more
referrals I've really taken advantage of
those opportunities and I'm thankful for
the relationships that I've put together
through those networking organizations
and the contacts and the referral
business that it's brought in an
addition and the third thing that I did
that really made a big difference here
was we spent additional money and
resources into the down economy to put
together new marketing materials to
rebrand ourselves we put together an
entirely new company website and a new
online image we put together a social
media campaign to do outreach through
facebook twitter and linkedin and
company linkedin page and that really
helped get our company more awareness in
the marketplace for what we do and then
lastly one of the things that i think
was in from instrumental in our recovery
was focusing on the company's core
strengths going back to enterprise
clientele and we just had our best
quarter in q1 of 2010 producing more
gross revenue and more net profit than
any previous quarter in the last three
years the company is back on a great
path and we look forward to the balance
of 2010 and beyond in which we intend to
continue to grow our business expanding
our operations in southeast Michigan
entering the health care marketplace in
the new york city area and really using
using this expertise that we have in
information
biology to help those businesses gain a
competitive advantage thank you
